operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Explicit operation to perform: "create", "read", "update", "delete", or "find". If not specified, operation will be inferred from context: has fieldDataJson + recordId = update, has fieldDataJson only = create, has recordId only = read, has searchTerm/filtersJson = find, has recordId only (no data/search) = delete.

fieldDataJson.title: Field Data JSON
fieldDataJson.description: JSON string containing CustomerOrders__c field data. For create: {"Name":"Order-2024-001","Order_Number__c":"ORD-001","Status__c":"Pending"}. For update: {"Status__c":"Shipped","Shipping_Date__c":"2024-12-31"}. For bulk operations: [{"Name":"Order 1"},{"Name":"Order 2"}]. Required for create/update operations. The agent should construct this JSON from natural language user input.

recordId.title: Record ID
recordId.description: The Salesforce record ID (15 or 18 character) of the Customer Order. Required for read/update/delete operations. Format: 18-character ID like "a01xx000003DGbYAAW". For update, can be omitted if Name or Order_Number__c is provided in fieldDataJson for automatic resolution. The agent should resolve this from order name/number when possible rather than asking the user for an ID.

searchTerm.title: Search Term
searchTerm.description: Text to search for in Customer Order fields (Name, Order_Number__c, PO_Number__c, etc.). Used for find operations. Example: "Order-2024-001" or "ORD-001". IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find a customer order but hasn't provided a search term, ask them for the order name, order number, or other identifying information BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

filtersJson.title: Filters JSON
filtersJson.description: JSON string of exact-match filters for find operations. Can be single object {"fieldApiName":"Status__c","value":"Pending"} or array [{"fieldApiName":"Status__c","value":"Pending"}]. IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find a customer order but hasn't provided specific filters, ask them for details like order number, account name, or status BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

searchLimit.title: Search Limit
searchLimit.description: Maximum number of records to return for find operations (default: 5, max: 20).

accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: Account name to resolve to Account__c lookup. If provided, system searches for an Account and links the Order to it.

contactNameOrEmail.title: Contact Name or Email
contactNameOrEmail.description: Contact name or email to resolve to Contact__c lookup. If provided, system searches for a Contact and links the Order to them.

lineItemsJson.title: Line Items JSON
lineItemsJson.description: JSON array of line items to create with the order (for create operation). Optional. Format: [{"Product_Name__c":"Widget A","Quantity__c":10,"Unit_Price__c":50.00}]. Each line item requires: Product_Name__c, Quantity__c, Unit_Price__c.

addLineItemsJson.title: Add Line Items JSON
addLineItemsJson.description: JSON array of NEW line items to add to the order (for update operation). Format: [{"Product_Name__c":"Widget C","Quantity__c":3,"Unit_Price__c":75.00}]. Each line item requires: Product_Name__c, Quantity__c, Unit_Price__c.

updateLineItemsJson.title: Update Line Items JSON
updateLineItemsJson.description: JSON array of EXISTING line items to update (for update operation). Format: [{"Id":"a00xxx...","Quantity__c":50}]. Each item must include the line item Id plus the fields to change.

deleteLineItemIds.title: Delete Line Item IDs
deleteLineItemIds.description: JSON array of line item IDs to delete from the order (for update operation). Format: ["a00xxx...","a00yyy..."]. Each ID should be the 18-character Salesforce ID of a Customer_Order_Line_Item__c record.

confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.description: For create/update: Set to false to preview only without committing. Default (true): Commits immediately. For delete: Set to true to actually delete. Default (false): Returns confirmation message first. The agent should first call delete with confirm=false, ask the user, then call again with confirm=true if confirmed.
